title.en: Respiratory Pulse of the Emerald Void

description.ko: 식물적 생명과 천상의 에너지 사이의 간극을 메우는 살아있는 유기체의 생물학적 메커니즘을 심층적으로 탐구합니다.
description.en: A deep-dive into the biological mechanics of AURA-7, showcasing a living organ that bridges the gap between plant life and celestial energy.

prompt: An ultra-detailed cinematic 3D render of AURA-7, depicting a complex respiratory lung-like organism woven from translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and deep #2D5A3D vascular vines. The entity floats in a silent, pitch-black liquid void, rhythmically inhaling #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores that shimmer like microscopic stars. Pulsating #FFE66D liquid sap flows through internal capillary networks, creating a warm, living internal glow beneath a membrane of liquid silk. 8k resolution, rendered in Octane with hyper-realistic fluid dynamics, volumetric light shafts, and extreme soft focus bokeh.
